# xelon_iso (Data Source)

The ISO data source provides information about an existing ISO.

## Example Usage

### Using ID

```terraform
data "xelon_iso" "debian" {
  id = "435f15aa750a"
}
```

### Using name

```terraform
data "xelon_iso" "debian" {
  name = "debian"
}
```

### Using ID and name

```terraform
data "xelon_iso" "debian" {
  id   = "435f15aa750a"
  name = "debian"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (String) The ID of the ISO.
- `name` (String) The name of the ISO.

### Read-Only

- `active` (Boolean) Whether ISO is active and can be used.
- `cloud_id` (String) The ID of the cloud.
- `description` (String) The ISO description.
